DOC.brief_summary: In protocol investigator test effect dalfampridine ( potassium channel blocker ) genioglossus muscle activity ( EMG GG ) wakefulness sleep healthy control subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dalfampridine ( 4-AP ) Genioglossus Muscle Activity Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Two overnight sleep study , placebo night drug night , perform approximately one week apart random order . The placebo drug administer 3 hour light . At least 10 minute quiet wakefulness record quantify subject 's awake EMG GG activity administration placebo/dalfampridine . EMG GG activity measure 10 min lights stable NREM REM sleep ( free arousal artifact ) . During second part night , subject connect modified continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) machine ( Pcrit3000 , Respironics ) provide wide range pressure 20 -20 cmH2O order modify upper airway pressure measure change EMG GG function epiglottic pressure ( muscle responsiveness ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy control subject Cardiovascular disease well control hypertension History seizure
